levels.author: Yuliya Astapova
levels.storyline:
All is quiet and serene in your kingdom of Wisteria, but a sudden feeling of foreboding fills the air. Your military adviser, High General Norbert McBeige, bursts into the room.

"My Liege, we have received troubling reports from the countryside! An unidentified enemy has been attacking our villages and leaving them emptied of life," he briefs you.

"The pattern of attacks has led us to believe that this enemy is heading straight toward Wisteria Castle. As the heart of our kingdom, it must be protected at all costs!" he declares.

You silently ponder this. There has been peace in this kingdom for a long time. The last time your kingdom was at war was early during the reign of your grandmother, Agatha the Warrior Queen.

You wonder where your Chief Advisor is at a time like this, for you are sorely lacking the counsel of the great Razy DaZel, high mage of the kingdom.

Just as you think this, a loud explosion rocks the castle, and you hear several east-facing windows shatter. No doubt this came from Magus DaZel's laboratory. Was this planned?

You have no time left to consider this, as you hear the warhorn sound at the gates. They are coming, and you must defend your kingdom.
levels.title: An Unknown Enemy

levels.author: Yuliya Astapova
levels.storyline:
You manage to beat back the surprise attackers, and regroup with your High General.

"Excellent work, My Liege! You've saved us once again. I fear, however, that we haven't seen the last of them. The attackers seemed to be wearing the attire of forest robbers. It is unthinkable why they would choose to attack the castle."

You ask him the whereabouts of your Chief Adviser, Magus DaZel.

"We're not sure, My Liege. The explosion you heard earlier indeed seemed to originate in his tower. I have sent a page to investigate."

You think back to the stories your uncle told you about the Great, Wise, and Powerful Razy DaZel, and how he defeated and turned away the only known living dragon just before you were born. You assume his magic would make short work of a few paltry invading thieves.

A second blast from the warhorn alerts you to a new attack. You prepare to face them again.
levels.title: The Confusion Continues
Level 3
